name: dayz-server-manager
description: A server installer and watch-dog for dayz with built-in Discord and RCon bot

scripts.downloadPrebuildWindows: npm run installSqlite && npm run installPty && npm run installProcessList
scripts.downloadPrebuildLinux: npm run installSqliteLinux && npm run installPtyLinux && npm run installProcessListLinux
scripts.installSqlite: cd node_modules/better-sqlite3 && npx prebuild-install -d -r node -t v14.0.0 --arch x64 --platform win32
scripts.installSqliteLinux: cd node_modules/better-sqlite3 && npx prebuild-install -d -r node -t v14.0.0 --arch x64 --platform linux
scripts.installPty: cd node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch && npx prebuild-install -d -r node -t v14.0.0 --arch x64 --platform win32
scripts.installPtyLinux: cd node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch && npx prebuild-install -d -r node -t v14.0.0 --arch x64 --platform linux
scripts.installProcessList: cd node_modules/@senfo/process-list && npx prebuild-install -d -r node -t v14.0.0 --arch x64 --platform win32
scripts.installProcessListLinux: cd node_modules/@senfo/process-list && npx prebuild-install -d -r node -t v14.0.0 --arch x64 --platform linux
scripts.packWindows: del-cli build/dayz-server-manager* && cp VERSION dist/VERSION && pkg --out-path build -t node14-win-x64 .
scripts.packLinux: npmdel-cli build/dayz-server-manager* && cp VERSION dist/VERSION && pkg --out-path build -t node14-linux-x64 .
scripts.buildUi: del-cli dist/ui && cd ui && npm run build
scripts.buildUiIfAbsent: node scripts/exists.js dist/ui || npm run buildUi
scripts.build: del-cli dist/* !dist/ui && tsc && npm run generators && npm run buildUiIfAbsent && npm run buildPbos
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run mkdirExec && cd exec && node ../dist/index.js
scripts.buildAndPack: npm run build && npm run packWindows
scripts.startPacked: npm run buildAndPack && npm run runPacked
scripts.runPacked: npm run mkdirExec && cd exec && bash -c './../build/dayz-server-manager.exe'
scripts.buildPbos: npm run buildMainPbo && npm run buildExpPbo
